Author: Michael Shin
Body: Great for my classic cc. Better than the factory.

Author: Rduairport Taxidispatch
Body: I love this app it is the best software ever it is better than the company itself app the company need to pay you guys for this app to be available as Android and iPhone app thank you for the good job

Author: Robert McHenry
Body: Love it. It just works great! My favorite!
Awesome!!!  It's a must have

Author: Jim Hill
Body: Edit: After using this app for a couple of days, I am upgrading my review. This is the best app for this period. It is far superior to Midnite Solar's own solution.  With some tweaking on my tablet the battery lasts well now.   "This app seems to kill my battery quite fast like to leave it active on a tablet stuck to my wall but I think it keeps the WiFi active even after the screen times out. Perhaps the developer could add some code to put the app to sleep when the screen times out."

Author: klittlet005
Subject: Very useful
Body: Great for monitoring my system over WiFi. I think the firmware on my charge controller is old or something...some things don't quite display correctly. The daily log calendar doesn't match .seems to be off by one day. Like I said probably my charge controller firmware

Author: Walt Tripp
Body: This app is  without any question the best to keep track of your systems especially when their spread out as long as you can network them to a central location. Early visions of classic firmware don't work well so I recommend installing the latest from midnite solar. I haven't tried it on the morningstar but plan to and will give a review on that.

Author: Chris Schoen
Body: Impressive APP! I am running three Midnite Solar Classics. This APP provides me with some powerful real-time information and data collection using my Local WIFI. The "System" views are excellent...nice touch!

Author: Rick Copeland
Subject: Great app
Body: Great little app. Provides excellent information on the spot in easy to read layout..

Author: steve white
Body: Great app been using for a while now. Midnite Solar should scrap there's and pay you for a PC / Mac versions. Thank you.

Author: Lou Russo
Subject: Great!
Body: Midnite should hire this person. App works perfect. Updates and bug fixes come at a nice pace.

Author: ki7xh
Body: This is a wonderful app if you have Classic controllers in your system.  It's instantly become my go-to method of checking my R.E. system's condition when I'm home and on my LAN.  Tho' I wasn't around when they invented sliced bread, I'm pretty certain this is the best thing since.

Author: Leon Cantwell
Subject: Just what I was looking for!
Body: I track my Classic with my Android tablet and this has everything I was looking for that MidNite Solar did not include in their Android version.

Author: wade shockley
Body: Very good app

Author: George Rochat
Body: I have been using this app for about a month.  The graphics are great and easy to read.  The connection is fast when I connect via the local router.  When I am traveling I can connect via WiFi but the connection time can be a bit long but the results are worth the wait.  I would like to see a field that is labeled "estimated time to full charge".   This is a very good app and worth supporting.

Author: Edward Gay
Subject: Unable to connect
Body: I'd love to be able to see what the other reviewers love about the app, but it finds my Classic 200 IP address and doesn't connect. Any help would be appreciated. I have an Acer tablet.

Author: Stephan Gradadige
Subject: Version 2.1.2
Body: Very nice app. Interface is nice & simple. The hourly log chart is great, you can even change what the graph shows, Power, PV Voltage, Battery Voltage, Battery Current & Energy. This app is better than Midnite Solars app, quicker response & you don't need Adobe Air, HOORAY! The app is not capable of programing the unit, which is fine by me. Great work by the programmer.

Author: Barry Shaw
Subject: Motorola zoom tablet netgear 763s hotspot sierra hub
Body: Awsome app really well designed guages all the right data and crisp and clear choice of colours.

Author: Larry Kapp
Subject: Great display dials
Body: This is a useful easy to use display for the classic.

Author: Brandon St.Rose
Subject: First class
Body: This is the best there is. Would loved to edit my classic settings. Also support for whizz bang Jr readings.

Author: John Easterday
Subject: Classic monitor
Body: Nice work on this.  If you could export data that would be bonus points.

Author: Nick Tsarhatsidis
Body: Excellent midnite classic tool the only thing that could make it better remote networking

Author: Der Bewerter
Body: Endlich auch für Morningstar eine gute optische Darstellung. Bitte weiter entwickeln!!!!!!! Nur zu empfehlen auch wenn noch einiges fehlt.  Daumen hoch😉👈🖒

Author: Ra Phael
Subject: Beste Solar App im Store!!!!
Body: Bitte weiter entwickeln! Funktioniert super mit meiner Morningstar TriStar MPPT 60 Laderegelung.

Author: agruener1972
Subject: Best PV App ever!
Body: Absolut genial!!!

Author: Crapcbm
Body: perfekt!

Author: Alexander Gusenko
Subject: GSMART ROMA RX DUAL
Body: Отличный мониторинг зарядной станции от солнечной энергии.Огромное спасибо разработчику!!!

Author: Edgard Moncada
Subject: Conexion
Body: Tiene una pequeña falla, no esta aplicacion no es multiusuarios, si algun usuario esta revisando el mismo classic 150 el otro no puede visualizar nada

Author: Rodas
Body: Funciona perfectamente no le pongo 6 estrellas porque no me deja.  Un pero no me sale el símbolo con el % de carga de la batería. Solucionado, muchas gracias

Author: Miquel Bennasar
Subject: Fantastica
Body: Un gran trabajo gracias.

Author: Victor Antonio
Subject: Víctor prado
Body: Pero si carga dará batería gratis

Author: Juan Julio Corica
Subject: Excelente
Body: Excelente aplicación, mucho más clara que la original de midnite. Para una nueva versión, que se pueda modificar los datos de conexión.
